messages.subject: Writing a book? was Re: [AlwaysLearning] equality, sort of
messages.msgSnippet: Pam, Sandra, Joyce, Deb, Kelly, Others, Any plans to write a book?  The message boards and yahoogroups are great, but I love sitting down with a book.  I also
messages.messageBody:
Pam, Sandra, Joyce, Deb, Kelly, Others,

Any plans to write a book? The message boards and yahoogroups are great, but I love sitting down with a book. I also periodically send books to my ex-husband and he has actually read them. This time I'm sending him The Unprocessed Child. I've often thought someone should take all those posts off the old lists and put them in a huge book. I know my ex-husband and friends will read books I lend them, but they won't spend time on the internet researching and reading at the message boards.

Anyone?

:o)
Nichole

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
